original_text: Even the best and kindest woman among you will turn against the husband that she loves. She will turn against her sons and daughters. She has been rich enough to have everything that she needs.
korean_text: 또 너희 중에 온유하고 연약한 부녀 곧 온유하고 연약하여 자기 발바닥으로 땅을 밟아 보지도 아니하던 자라도 자기 품의 남편과 자기 자녀를 미운 눈으로 바라보며

sentences.original_text: Even the best and kindest woman among you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에 가장 선하고 착한 여인이라도

sentences.original_text: will turn against the husband that she loves
sentences.korean_translation: 자기가 사랑하는 남편을 대적하게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: She will turn against her sons and daughters
She has been rich enough to have everything
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 모든 것을 가질 만큼 부유했다
